title: desire lines
description: A chapbook by Chansonette Buck, desire lines (CC#22) features 17 poems on high quality ivory paper with an ashen orange and white cardstock cover bearing a Steven Smith foto. Dimensions: 8.5 x 7 inches. It is available for $7 (includes postage) from Crisis Chronicles Press, 3344 W. 105th Street #4, Cleveland, Ohio 44111.
author: Chansonette Buck
